location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Technical drawings by Bergius Company Limited

physicalDescription.extent: 4 folios of pen and ink technical drawings on tracing paper
Condition:The folios are in good condition though lightly discoloured and creased throughout.Foliation:‘158’; ‘159’; ‘160’; ‘161’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:Four folios of technical drawings of engines and parts, printed in Great Britain by the Bergius Co. Ltd.The diagrams on the first two folios (ff 158v, 159r) are cross-sections of the model ‘G4’ engine.The diagrams on the second two folios (ff 160r, 161v) are cross-sections of propellers, drawn to different scales.One diagram from f 159r and one diagram from f 160r have been cut out and pasted into the hand-drawn profile on f 166.
